text: Helen Delich Bentley (November 28, 1923 - August 6, 2016) was an American politician. She was a Republican. Bentley was a member of the United States House of Representatives from Maryland. She served as a representatives from 1985 to 1995. Bentley was born in Ruth, Nevada. She was of Serbian descent. She studied at the University of Nevada and George Washington University, and earned a BA from the University of Missouri in 1944. ==References== ==Other websites== *A Few Good Women... title: Helen Delich Bentley
